name: Mombasa Python
body:
### Mombasa Python User Group

Currently there isn't a [python](https://www.python.org) user group in Mombasa, Kenya. [Britone Mwasaru](https://twitter.com/bmwasaru) is starting a technology community in [Technical University of Mombasa](https://www.tum.ac.ke). For the students that are planning to venture into programming will be introduced to python. 

### Why a python user group?

Python is a language that is easy to learn therefore a good introductory language especially to the first year students. This is to show how fun and easy programming can be hence get rid of the fear of programming.

Cheers to a journey of self discovery :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
